name: Star Girl Makeover
description:
The life of a Star Girls is pretty amazing. Think you’d like to get a chance to experience that lifestyle for yourself? The fashion, makeup, and amazing dress up that they get are at your fingertips.

Being a celebrity grants a lot of privileges. You being a pop star means that you can experience all of the fun makeup looks and dress up in some amazing fashion trends. You’ve got to grab this opportunity with both hands and take full advantage of being pampered like your favorite star. Head to toe, you’ll go through an awe-inspiring transformation.

Star Girls Makeover Functionality:-
- Spa - Makeup
- Dress up

-> Spa

Apply unique and beautiful face packs to make Girl look more beautiful!
Remove her pimples, extra eye brow hairs, under eye marks, black dots and give her a clean.

-> Make-up

- Star girl to look beautiful with unique Make-up.
- Give her Fashion look with beautiful makeup.
- Give Star girl more stunning look with unique eye shadows and glow.
- Make her cheeks more charming with unique cheek glow options
- Star girl make up would be incomplete without attractive lipsticks and lip glow.

-> Dress up

We have specially created unique outfits to give your Star girl to a perfect stunning and charming Star look!

Are you up for the exciting life of a pop star? It’s time to find out. Download today and get started with your new lifestyle. You’ll never look back.
